mechanical.modeling.components
Class MechanicalSystem

java.lang.Object
  mechanical.modeling.components.MechanicalSystem

public class MechanicalSystem
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates a mechanical system consisting of a set of mechanical components connected to various body-fixed reference frames.

Since:
Mar 23, 2014
Author:
Mathieu LŽger
